facilitiesDescription.description: Niranjan Tridha Bangalore South presents an exclusive opportunity to own a stunning home that offers all kinds of amenities and facilities. This includes a swimming pool, gymnasium, and easy access to club house.  It also has a children's play area, an exclusive offering only for Niranjan Tridha residents. Niranjan Tridha has an excellent combination of comfort and convenience to suit every requirement as well as need.

moreAboutProject.heading: More about Niranjan Tridha
moreAboutProject.description:
Niranjan Tridha in Kudlu Gate, Bangalore is a ready-to-move housing society. It offers apartments in varied budget range. These units are a perfect combination of comfort and style, specifically designed to suit your requirements and conveniences. There are 2BHK and 3BHK apartments available in this project. This housing society is now ready to be called home as families have started moving in. Check out some of the features of Niranjan Tridha housing society:

*Niranjan Tridha Kudlu Gate has single tower, with 9 floors each and 35 units on offer.

*Spread over an area of 0.6 acres, Niranjan Tridha Kudlu Gate, Bangalore is one of the spacious housing societies in the Bangalore South region. With all the basic amenities available, Niranjan Tridha fits into your budget and your lifestyle.

Niranjan Tridha Price List

If you are looking for ready to move projects, Niranjan Tridha is a right choice for you. Here, a 2BHK Apartment is available at a starting price of Rs. Price on Request while a 3BHK Apartment is offered at Rs. Price on Request onwards.

ConfigurationSizePrice
2BHK Apartment1,210 sqftRs. Price on Request
3BHK Apartment1,623 sqftRs. Price on Request

How is Kudlu Gate for property investment?

Kudlu Gate is one of the prime locations to own a home in Bangalore South. It has a promising social and physical infrastructure and an emerging neighbourhood.

builder.heading: About Niranjan Group
builder.name: Niranjan Group
builder.description:
Niranjan Group is a renowned developer, who ensures excellent returns on investment to its stakeholders. It is a concrete builder in the residential market of Bangalore. It aims to provide dynamic housing solutions to all its customers. They offer different styles of flats, villas, independent houses and serviced apartments. The team at Niranjan Group is professional and experienced with construction experts and land developers. They provide low-cost apartments for mid-income groups with green surroundings. 
Some of the notable residences are Niranjan Legend, Niranjan Genesis, Niranjan Amara Canopy, Niranjan DRF Home 18 located in the southern zones of Bangalore city.

tuples.title: Positives
tuples.review: Kudlu Gate is a good place, especially for shopping. There are lot of grocery shops supermarkets for essential purchases. Also the Rent of the area is cheaper compared to other areas in Bangalore. Soon the yellow line metro will open which will give more options to travel. Also major parts of the area is good with cleanliness. Also there are many hospitals and schools nearby.

tuples.title: Negatives
tuples.review: The area is not that safe compared to other areas in Bangalore. Lots of stray dogs are there. Also, the people here is not that friendly. the roads are not good. Lots of construction works nearby. It's very noisy and also lots of traffic jams. No variety of foods. Hotels are not well maintained which will result in Food infection and all. No place to sit and relax. No nearby parks.

tuples.title: Positives
tuples.review: kudlu gate is very good nice place i like it and public transport is easy to get and available metro also and good public school and good room available very adorable food and cool drinks also

tuples.title: Negatives
tuples.review: Traffic is very bad situation bus and car and bike going very speed then roads and signal very bad situation road almost 75% broken i don't like that roads and signals 20% not working. And auto availability is very bad.

tuples.title: Positives
tuples.review: It is a peaceful and calm area.The area has many apartments , houses along with super markets,malls and local Shops for daily needs. Schools like Orchid International and VIBGYOR. It has many hospitals like Narayana and Columbia Asia are nearby.There are also parks and gyms for fitness and relaxation.Especially people working in nearby IT hubs like Electronic City and bellandur.It has easy access to major roads like Hosur road, Sarjapura road and outer ring road making it travel to places like Electronic City and silk board.buses autos and cabs are always available.it is near to main kudlu metro station.There's regular police petroling.It has a gud mix of residential and commercial areas.it has  metro stations.water supply is well and electricity supply is also gud.street lights are working properly.It has so many parks and cinima halls.so many pgs are available so it is helpful for students, working professionals and job seekers.compare to other areas traffic is so light in this area.It has lakes so attract to visitors.Noise pollution is not there.Markets are walkable distance.colleges are nearby.it Is nice place to live.

tuples.title: Negatives
tuples.review: Traffic is there in sometimes. In some areas water shortage problems are happening. Power cut problem is there.overcrowded place and heavy green spaces.road are not well maintained in rainy seasons its tough to travel in this road.medical facilities are not nearby.parking issues are there.

pros.text: The locality is well-served by public transportation options, including buses and auto-rickshaws, ensuring easy access to other parts of the city.
The roads are well-maintained, clean, and hygienic, making travel easy.
The area has many apartments, houses, supermarkets, malls, and local shops for daily needs.
Street lights are working properly. It has many parks and cinema halls.
In summary, Kudlu Gate in Bangalore South is a marvelous place to reside, offering convenience, tranquility, and a superb quality of life.

cons.text: In some areas, the water supply is not good, and power outages occur occasionally.
There is overcrowding and limited green spaces. Medical facilities are not available nearby.
The presence of street vendors leads to severe traffic congestion and considerable air pollution in the vicinity.

moreAboutProject.description:
For those looking to buy a residential property, here comes one of the choicest offerings in Bangalore South, at Jigala. Brought to you by Luxury Mark Developers, Luxury Mark Opera is among the newest addresses for homebuyers. This is a new launch project right now, and is expected to be delivered by Dec, 2026. It has a variety of options to choose from that too in a varied budget range.

Luxury Mark Opera Bangalore South is a RERA-registered housing society, which means all projects details are also available on state RERA website for end-users and investors. The RERA registration number of this project is PRM/KA/RERA/1251/308/PR/200325/007598.

Read on to know more about must-know features, Luxury Mark Opera, Floor Plans, Brochure download procedure and other exciting facts about the project.

Features & Amenities
  • The project is spread over an area of 1.1 acres.
  • There are around 88 units on offer.
  • Luxury Mark Opera Jigala, Bangalore housing society has single tower with 4 floors.
  • There is 1 phase in this project.
    PhasesPossession StatusPossession/Completion Date
    New LaunchDec, 2026
  • Luxury Mark Opera Bangalore South has some great amenities to offer such as Swimming Pool, Gymnasium and Basketball Court.
  • Elite Hospital is a popular landmark in Jigala.
  • Some popular transit points closest to Luxury Mark Opera are Attibele. Out of this, Attibele is the nearest from this location.

How to get Luxury Mark Opera Brochure?

View and download Luxury Mark Opera Official Brochure to take a comprehensive look at this upcoming housing society. It is a detailed prospectus about the society’s offerings, amenities, features, payment plans and a lot more. Click the ‘download’ icon on the main page to get the brochure in one click.

What is Luxury Mark Opera Address?

Jigala, Bangalore South

moreAboutProject.heading: More about Samrudhi Enclave
moreAboutProject.description:
Samrudhi Enclave in Billekahalli, JP Nagar, Bangalore is a ready to move housing society. This project is a perfect combination of comfort and style, specifically designed to suit your requirements and conveniences. This housing society is now ready to be called home as families have started moving in. Check out some of the features of Samrudhi Enclave housing society:

How is Billekahalli for property investment?

Billekahalli is one of the attractive locations to own a home in Bangalore South. It has a promising social and physical infrastructure and an emerging neighbourhood.

How is the future of Bangalore South property market?

Bangalore South real estate market has a range of property options in various price brackets. Billekahalli, JP Nagar, Bangalore in Bangalore South is one of the localities known for some of the best housing societies which makes it a suitable destinations for homebuyers looking for a property for self-use or investment purposes in the city. One thing that makes Bangalore South different from any other city in this region is its potential to attract investors through its flourishing job market and employment opportunities, bringing in fresh housing demand regularly. In addition to this, with metro connectivity improving and other infrastructure projects coming up in Bangalore South, these growth drivers are expected to influence the property prices here extensively.

tuples.title: Positives
tuples.review: Anugarh Layout is a very safe area, with the best access to nearby markets, hospitals, and schools. Plus, the roads here are smooth and well-lit. There is frequent police patrolling, and no hassle in finding parking spaces.

tuples.title: Negatives
tuples.review: Here, but if I find issues regarding traffic jams, plus a few streets in the colony are too broken and do not have a good drainage system, water comes out anytime and smells badly.

tuples.title: Positives
tuples.review: The area is primarily residential, and many good-hearted working individuals reside in this locality. The character of the house owners and the shop owners is fantastic, and also, the travel connectivity is quite good. This area is very close to the main attractions of Bangalore.

tuples.title: Negatives
tuples.review: The central negative aspect of this locality is the lack of frequent police patrols. The roads are not well-maintained, and we also need to be concerned about the hygiene in this area.

tuples.title: Positives
tuples.review: Bilekahalli is a well established and commercial locality. It's balanced mix of amenities, connectivity, good public transport , Easy cab and auto availability and affordability makes it a preferred choice for families, working professionals and students. The good schools are also nearby. Stores are available at a walkable distance. Good hospital are also available.

tuples.title: Negatives
tuples.review: There is frequent traffic jams in this area. Some times there is shortage of water. The metro is not nearby and the metro is in construction in this area. Those who travel in metro they face the problem as they have to travel to other area for metro.

pros.text: There is a lot of greenery and parks to relax the mind. The time spent there relieves all our stress, and the people around are very kind and generous.

cons.text: Finally, some residents have reported incidents of crime in the area, although it is generally considered a safe neighborhood.
The inner roads are not well maintained, with many potholes and poor drainage facilities.

facilitiesDescription.description: Niranjan Tridha Bangalore South presents an exclusive opportunity to own a stunning home that offers all kinds of amenities and facilities. This includes a swimming pool, gymnasium, and easy access to club house.  It also has a children's play area, an exclusive offering only for Niranjan Tridha residents. Niranjan Tridha has an excellent combination of comfort and convenience to suit every requirement as well as need.

moreAboutProject.heading: More about Niranjan Tridha
moreAboutProject.description:
Niranjan Tridha in Kudlu Gate, Bangalore is a ready-to-move housing society. It offers apartments in varied budget range. These units are a perfect combination of comfort and style, specifically designed to suit your requirements and conveniences. There are 2BHK and 3BHK apartments available in this project. This housing society is now ready to be called home as families have started moving in. Check out some of the features of Niranjan Tridha housing society:

*Niranjan Tridha Kudlu Gate has single tower, with 9 floors each and 35 units on offer.

*Spread over an area of 0.6 acres, Niranjan Tridha Kudlu Gate, Bangalore is one of the spacious housing societies in the Bangalore South region. With all the basic amenities available, Niranjan Tridha fits into your budget and your lifestyle.

Niranjan Tridha Price List

If you are looking for ready to move projects, Niranjan Tridha is a right choice for you. Here, a 2BHK Apartment is available at a starting price of Rs. Price on Request while a 3BHK Apartment is offered at Rs. Price on Request onwards.

ConfigurationSizePrice

How is Kudlu Gate for property investment?

Kudlu Gate is one of the prime locations to own a home in Bangalore South. It has a promising social and physical infrastructure and an emerging neighbourhood.

builder.name: Niranjan Group
builder.description:
Niranjan Group is a renowned developer, who ensures excellent returns on investment to its stakeholders. It is a concrete builder in the residential market of Bangalore. It aims to provide dynamic housing solutions to all its customers. They offer different styles of flats, villas, independent houses and serviced apartments. The team at Niranjan Group is professional and experienced with construction experts and land developers. They provide low-cost apartments for mid-income groups with green surroundings. 
Some of the notable residences are Niranjan Legend, Niranjan Genesis, Niranjan Amara Canopy, Niranjan DRF Home 18 located in the southern zones of Bangalore city.

tuples.title: Positives
tuples.review: Kudlu Gate is a good place, especially for shopping. There are lot of grocery shops supermarkets for essential purchases. Also the Rent of the area is cheaper compared to other areas in Bangalore. Soon the yellow line metro will open which will give more options to travel. Also major parts of the area is good with cleanliness. Also there are many hospitals and schools nearby.

tuples.title: Negatives
tuples.review: The area is not that safe compared to other areas in Bangalore. Lots of stray dogs are there. Also, the people here is not that friendly. the roads are not good. Lots of construction works nearby. It's very noisy and also lots of traffic jams. No variety of foods. Hotels are not well maintained which will result in Food infection and all. No place to sit and relax. No nearby parks.

tuples.title: Positives
tuples.review: kudlu gate is very good nice place i like it and public transport is easy to get and available metro also and good public school and good room available very adorable food and cool drinks also

tuples.title: Negatives
tuples.review: Traffic is very bad situation bus and car and bike going very speed then roads and signal very bad situation road almost 75% broken i don't like that roads and signals 20% not working. And auto availability is very bad.

tuples.title: Positives
tuples.review: It is a peaceful and calm area.The area has many apartments , houses along with super markets,malls and local Shops for daily needs. Schools like Orchid International and VIBGYOR. It has many hospitals like Narayana and Columbia Asia are nearby.There are also parks and gyms for fitness and relaxation.Especially people working in nearby IT hubs like Electronic City and bellandur.It has easy access to major roads like Hosur road, Sarjapura road and outer ring road making it travel to places like Electronic City and silk board.buses autos and cabs are always available.it is near to main kudlu metro station.There's regular police petroling.It has a gud mix of residential and commercial areas.it has  metro stations.water supply is well and electricity supply is also gud.street lights are working properly.It has so many parks and cinima halls.so many pgs are available so it is helpful for students, working professionals and job seekers.compare to other areas traffic is so light in this area.It has lakes so attract to visitors.Noise pollution is not there.Markets are walkable distance.colleges are nearby.it Is nice place to live.

tuples.title: Negatives
tuples.review: Traffic is there in sometimes. In some areas water shortage problems are happening. Power cut problem is there.overcrowded place and heavy green spaces.road are not well maintained in rainy seasons its tough to travel in this road.medical facilities are not nearby.parking issues are there.

tuples.title: Positives
tuples.review: Anugarh Layout is a very safe area, with the best access to nearby markets, hospitals, and schools. Plus, the roads here are smooth and well-lit. There is frequent police patrolling, and no hassle in finding parking spaces.

tuples.title: Negatives
tuples.review: Here, but if I find issues regarding traffic jams, plus a few streets in the colony are too broken and do not have a good drainage system, water comes out anytime and smells badly.

tuples.title: Positives
tuples.review: The area is primarily residential, and many good-hearted working individuals reside in this locality. The character of the house owners and the shop owners is fantastic, and also, the travel connectivity is quite good. This area is very close to the main attractions of Bangalore.

tuples.title: Negatives
tuples.review: The central negative aspect of this locality is the lack of frequent police patrols. The roads are not well-maintained, and we also need to be concerned about the hygiene in this area.

tuples.title: Positives
tuples.review: Bilekahalli is a well established and commercial locality. It's balanced mix of amenities, connectivity, good public transport , Easy cab and auto availability and affordability makes it a preferred choice for families, working professionals and students. The good schools are also nearby. Stores are available at a walkable distance. Good hospital are also available.

tuples.title: Negatives
tuples.review: There is frequent traffic jams in this area. Some times there is shortage of water. The metro is not nearby and the metro is in construction in this area. Those who travel in metro they face the problem as they have to travel to other area for metro.

moreAboutProject.heading: More about Adarsh Nest
moreAboutProject.description:
Adarsh Nest in JP Nagar, Bangalore is a ready to move housing society. This project is a perfect combination of comfort and style, specifically designed to suit your requirements and conveniences. This housing society is now ready to be called home as families have started moving in. Check out some of the features of Adarsh Nest housing society:

How is JP Nagar for property investment?

JP Nagar is one of the prime locations to own a home in Bangalore South. It has a promising social and physical infrastructure and an emerging neighbourhood.

How is the future of Bangalore South property market?

Bangalore South real estate market has a range of property options in various price brackets. JP Nagar, Bangalore in Bangalore South is one of the localities known for some of the best housing societies which makes it a suitable destinations for homebuyers looking for a property for self-use or investment purposes in the city. One thing that makes Bangalore South different from any other city in this region is its potential to attract investors through its flourishing job market and employment opportunities, bringing in fresh housing demand regularly. In addition to this, with metro connectivity improving and other infrastructure projects coming up in Bangalore South, these growth drivers are expected to influence the property prices here extensively.

moreAboutProject.heading: More about G R Nisarga Residency
moreAboutProject.description:
G R Nisarga Residency in Kengeri, Bangalore is a ready-to-move housing society. It offers apartments in varied budget range. These units are a perfect combination of comfort and style, specifically designed to suit your requirements and conveniences. There are 2BHK and 3BHK apartments available in this project. This housing society is now ready to be called home as families have started moving in. Check out some of the features of G R Nisarga Residency housing society:

*G R Nisarga Residency Kengeri has single tower, with 4 floors each and 44 units on offer.

*Spread over an area of 0.58 acres, G R Nisarga Residency Kengeri, Bangalore is one of the spacious housing societies in the Bangalore West region. With all the basic amenities available, G R Nisarga Residency fits into your budget and your lifestyle.

*Kengeri, Bangalore has good connectivity to some of the important areas in the proximity such as KBC PU College, Vishwa Venkateshwara Inter. School and Gleneagles BGS Hospital and so on.

G R Nisarga Residency Price List

If you are looking for ready to move projects, G R Nisarga Residency is a right choice for you. Here, a 2BHK Apartment is available at a starting price of Rs. 78.43 L while a 3BHK Apartment is offered at Rs. 98.98 L onwards.

ConfigurationSizePrice
2BHK Apartment1,145 sqftRs. 78.43 L
3BHK Apartment1,445 sqftRs. 98.98 L

How is Kengeri for property investment?

Kengeri is one of the prime locations to own a home in Bangalore West. It has a promising social and physical infrastructure and an emerging neighbourhood. Check out few benefits of staying in this locality:

  • Kengeri Metro Station, 3.5 km
  • NH 48, 4.9 km
  • YGR Signature mall, 5 km
  • Bengaluru University, 6.6 km
  • Hejjala Station, 16.7 km
  • Safina Business Park, 19.6 km
  • Kempegowda International Airport, 52.5 km
moreAboutProject.specificationSubHeading:
Structure: RCC framed structure conforming to IS codes for earthquake and wind loads.
Masonry: Solid blocks for walls,

layerContent.specifications:
Structure: RCC framed structure conforming to IS codes for earthquake and wind loads.
Masonry: Solid blocks for walls, external 6" and internal 4" thick.
Flooring: Vitrified tiles for Living, Kitchen, Dining, and all Bedrooms. Anti-skid tiles in balcony and utility.
Kitchen: Polished Granite platform with SS sink, glazed tile dadoing, provision for chimney, aqua guard, washing machine, mixie, and grinder.
Toilets: Jaguar/ESS-ESS Equivalent Cold & hot water mixed in all toilets, glazed/ceramic tiles up to 7 feet height, Hindware Fittings, EWC, and wash basin in all toilets provided.
Doors: Main doors: Teak wood frame with HDF Moulded design shutters. Internal Doors: Hardwood frame with GDF Moulded design shutters.
Windows: UPVC sliding windows with clear glass.
Electrical: Concealed conducts with copper wiring of Anchor or equivalent. Elegant Modular Switches of Anchor or equivalent. TV and Telephone connectivity in Living and bedroom.
Power Backup: Power back-up for common area lift, water pumps, and lightings.
Water Supply: Underground and overhead storage tanks of Suitable Capacity.
Common Areas: Combination of Granite & Tiles. Granite flooring for staircase with MS Railing.
Painting: Asian Paints for Interior Plastic emulsion paint. External ACE, Enamel Paint for MS grill/door.
Lift: 2 Nos Standard make Lifts

tuples.review: Peaceful environment compared to the city center, kengeri is less crowded and has a calm atmosphere, making it a good residential area. Affordable housing compared to central Bangalore, property and rental rates in kengeri are more budget -friends.

tuples.title: Negatives
tuples.review: Drainage, pollution, loss of open spaces. Bad odors especially near the river. Power cuts, poor connectivity traffic, water issues safety at nights. Very frequent and long hours of power outage resource allocation is scarce.

tuples.title: Positives
tuples.review: Ksrtc satellite bus stand in Kengeri connects to various parts of Karnataka. Namma Metro Purple Line has extended to Kengeri, making commute to central Bangalore easier. Suitable for families and retirees seeking a calm lifestyle. Less water issues compared to some interior Bangalore locations.

tuples.title: Negatives
tuples.review: Frequent water shortages are reported in some areas, especially during summer. Poor drainage systems lead to bad smells and mosquitoes in certain locations. Some pockets feel unsafe at night due to inadequate street lighting. There are reports of chain snatching in less crowded areas. Heavy traffic jams occur near Kengeri Satellite Bus Stand, particularly during peak hours. Narrow roads in interior Kengeri cause congestion.

tuples.title: Positives
tuples.review: Availability of BMTC buses, metro, and train services. Close to Mysore Road, Rajarajeshwari Nagar, and Global Village Tech Park. Affordable rental and property rates compared to central Bangalore. A good option for families, students, and IT professionals seeking peaceful living.

tuples.title: Negatives
tuples.review: Sone interior roads and low-lying areas in kengeri experience waterlogging during heavy rains, making it difficult to commute. There are fewer malls, multiplexes and hangout spots, making it less attractive for those seeking active nightlife.

moreAboutProject.heading: More about SVR Pine Ridge
moreAboutProject.description:
SVR Pine Ridge in Jakkur, Bangalore is a ready to move housing society. This project is a perfect combination of comfort and style, specifically designed to suit your requirements and conveniences. This housing society is now ready to be called home as families have started moving in. Check out some of the features of SVR Pine Ridge housing society:

* Spread over an area of 0.32 acres, SVR Pine Ridge is one of the spacious housing societies in the Bangalore North region. With all the basic amenities available, SVR Pine Ridge fits into your budget and your lifestyle.

How is Jakkur for property investment?

Jakkur is one of the attractive locations to own a home in Bangalore North. It has a promising social and physical infrastructure and an emerging neighbourhood.

How is the future of Bangalore North property market?

Bangalore North real estate market has a range of property options in various price brackets. Jakkur, Bangalore in Bangalore North is one of the localities known for some of the best housing societies which makes it a suitable destinations for homebuyers looking for a property for self-use or investment purposes in the city. One thing that makes Bangalore North different from any other city in this region is its potential to attract investors through its flourishing job market and employment opportunities, bringing in fresh housing demand regularly. In addition to this, with metro connectivity improving and other infrastructure projects coming up in Bangalore North, these growth drivers are expected to influence the property prices here extensively.

This area is very crowded and has enough traffic jam. Poor cabs or auto rickshaw availability

pros.text: This locality is very famous for its educational institutions, good hospitals, and well-maintained parks.
In addition, there are plenty of shopping options and entertainment centers nearby, making it an exciting place to live.

Good parks and gardens are available nearby, with good water facilities in all areas. Rachenahalli Lake is here, and average public transport is available. There are badminton and cricket sports academies, and the condition of public toilets is very good.

cons.text: The region also has some drawbacks, including frequent traffic congestion, high property prices, and water shortages.
The nearest shopping mall is quite distant. Waste disposal is an issue that the municipality has not managed correctly at all.

Sometime there are heavy power cuts without notice. Good hospitals are not available here. Garbage cleaning staff does not work properly. Good schools and colleges are far away. Metro station connectivity is not available.

moreAboutProject.heading: More about Esteem Enclave
moreAboutProject.description:
Esteem Enclave in Sarvobhogam Nagar, Bannerghatta Road is a ready-to-move housing society. It offers apartments in varied budget range. These units are a perfect combination of comfort and style, specifically designed to suit your requirements and conveniences. There are 2BHK apartments available in this project. This housing society is now ready to be called home as families have started moving in. Check out some of the features of Esteem Enclave housing society:

*Esteem Enclave Sarvobhogam Nagar has 7 towers, with 9 floors each and 281 units on offer.

*Spread over an area of 4 acres, Esteem Enclave Sarvobhogam Nagar, Bannerghatta Road is one of the spacious housing societies in the Bangalore South region. With all the basic amenities available, Esteem Enclave fits into your budget and your lifestyle.

Esteem Enclave Price List

If you are looking for ready to move projects, Esteem Enclave is a right choice for you. Here, a 2BHK Apartment is available at a starting price of Rs. 1.2 Cr.

moreAboutProject.description:
Essjay Divine Bliss in Rajarajeshwari Nagar, Bangalore is a ready to move housing society. This project is a perfect combination of comfort and style, specifically designed to suit your requirements and conveniences. This housing society is now ready to be called home as families have started moving in. Check out some of the features of Essjay Divine Bliss housing society:

How is Rajarajeshwari Nagar for property investment?

Rajarajeshwari Nagar is one of the attractive locations to own a home in Bangalore West. It has a promising social and physical infrastructure and an emerging neighbourhood.

How is the future of Bangalore West property market?

Bangalore West real estate market has a range of property options in various price brackets. Rajarajeshwari Nagar, Bangalore in Bangalore West is one of the localities known for some of the best housing societies which makes it a suitable destinations for homebuyers looking for a property for self-use or investment purposes in the city. One thing that makes Bangalore West different from any other city in this region is its potential to attract investors through its flourishing job market and employment opportunities, bringing in fresh housing demand regularly. In addition to this, with metro connectivity improving and other infrastructure projects coming up in Bangalore West, these growth drivers are expected to influence the property prices here extensively.

tuples.title: Positives
tuples.review: An ideal house layout has good road access to Mysore road, NICE road and outer Ring road. Metro connection is also nearby improving public transport connectivity. The area has a school ,colleges ,hospitals and supermarkets in closed reach parks and community ground had to live ability. It is mainly planned for residential with wide road ,organized plot and relatively less congestion compared to Central Bangalore.

tuples.title: Negatives
tuples.review: Road leading to Mysore road and NICE junction face peak hours congestion, and commuting to CBD areas can take a long time. It is slightly far from Central Bangalore so daily travel to it hubs can be time consuming.

tuples.title: Positives
tuples.review: Living here is convenient , metro, schools, banks, and supermarkets all nearby. Internet and power supply are very reliable, and water comes regularly. Streetlights work well, and traffic cops actually monitor signals at major junctions.

tuples.title: Negatives
tuples.review: The only issue is the constant honking near the bus stop. Dust from passing vehicles makes the air stuffy. Potholes return after every rain. Garbage bins overflow by Sunday evening, and there is always a mild strech till Monday morning.

tuples.title: Positives
tuples.review: Bangarappanagar Rajeshwari Nagar Mysore Bangalore West offers a tranquil atmosphere, making it an ideal residential area for those seeking a calm life style .The area boasts superb  connectivity via the the NICE bangalore -mysore experssway and mysore road, ensuring easy acess to various partof bangalore .

tuples.title: Negatives
tuples.review: Bangarappanagar Rajeshwari Nagar, Mysore, Bangalore West, increasing traffic , especially during peak hours, might affect daily commutes.

moreAboutProject.heading: More about G R Nisarga Residency
moreAboutProject.description:
G R Nisarga Residency in Kengeri, Bangalore is a ready-to-move housing society. It offers apartments in varied budget range. These units are a perfect combination of comfort and style, specifically designed to suit your requirements and conveniences. There are 2BHK and 3BHK apartments available in this project. This housing society is now ready to be called home as families have started moving in. Check out some of the features of G R Nisarga Residency housing society:

*G R Nisarga Residency Kengeri has single tower, with 4 floors each and 44 units on offer.

*Spread over an area of 0.58 acres, G R Nisarga Residency Kengeri, Bangalore is one of the spacious housing societies in the Bangalore West region. With all the basic amenities available, G R Nisarga Residency fits into your budget and your lifestyle.

*Kengeri, Bangalore has good connectivity to some of the important areas in the proximity such as KBC PU College, Vishwa Venkateshwara Inter. School and Gleneagles BGS Hospital and so on.

G R Nisarga Residency Price List

If you are looking for ready to move projects, G R Nisarga Residency is a right choice for you. Here, a 2BHK Apartment is available at a starting price of Rs. 78.43 L while a 3BHK Apartment is offered at Rs. 98.98 L onwards.

ConfigurationSizePrice
2BHK Apartment1,145 sqftRs. 78.43 L
3BHK Apartment1,445 sqftRs. 98.98 L

How is Kengeri for property investment?

Kengeri is one of the prime locations to own a home in Bangalore West. It has a promising social and physical infrastructure and an emerging neighbourhood. Check out few benefits of staying in this locality:

  • Kengeri Metro Station, 3.5 km
  • NH 48, 4.9 km
  • YGR Signature mall, 5 km
  • Bengaluru University, 6.6 km
  • Hejjala Station, 16.7 km
  • Safina Business Park, 19.6 km
  • Kempegowda International Airport, 52.5 km

Structure: RCC framed structure conforming to IS codes for earthquake and wind loads.
Masonry: Solid blocks for walls,

layerContent.specifications:
Structure: RCC framed structure conforming to IS codes for earthquake and wind loads.
Masonry: Solid blocks for walls, external 6" and internal 4" thick.
Flooring: Vitrified tiles for Living, Kitchen, Dining, and all Bedrooms. Anti-skid tiles in balcony and utility.
Kitchen: Polished Granite platform with SS sink, glazed tile dadoing, provision for chimney, aqua guard, washing machine, mixie, and grinder.
Toilets: Jaguar/ESS-ESS Equivalent Cold & hot water mixed in all toilets, glazed/ceramic tiles up to 7 feet height, Hindware Fittings, EWC, and wash basin in all toilets provided.
Doors: Main doors: Teak wood frame with HDF Moulded design shutters. Internal Doors: Hardwood frame with GDF Moulded design shutters.
Windows: UPVC sliding windows with clear glass.
Electrical: Concealed conducts with copper wiring of Anchor or equivalent. Elegant Modular Switches of Anchor or equivalent. TV and Telephone connectivity in Living and bedroom.
Power Backup: Power back-up for common area lift, water pumps, and lightings.
Water Supply: Underground and overhead storage tanks of Suitable Capacity.
Common Areas: Combination of Granite & Tiles. Granite flooring for staircase with MS Railing.
Painting: Asian Paints for Interior Plastic emulsion paint. External ACE, Enamel Paint for MS grill/door.
Lift: 2 Nos Standard make Lifts

tuples.title: Positives
tuples.review: Peaceful environment compared to the city center, kengeri is less crowded and has a calm atmosphere, making it a good residential area. Affordable housing compared to central Bangalore, property and rental rates in kengeri are more budget -friends.

tuples.title: Negatives
tuples.review: Drainage, pollution, loss of open spaces. Bad odors especially near the river. Power cuts, poor connectivity traffic, water issues safety at nights. Very frequent and long hours of power outage resource allocation is scarce.

tuples.title: Positives
tuples.review: Ksrtc satellite bus stand in Kengeri connects to various parts of Karnataka. Namma Metro Purple Line has extended to Kengeri, making commute to central Bangalore easier. Suitable for families and retirees seeking a calm lifestyle. Less water issues compared to some interior Bangalore locations.

tuples.title: Negatives
tuples.review: Frequent water shortages are reported in some areas, especially during summer. Poor drainage systems lead to bad smells and mosquitoes in certain locations. Some pockets feel unsafe at night due to inadequate street lighting. There are reports of chain snatching in less crowded areas. Heavy traffic jams occur near Kengeri Satellite Bus Stand, particularly during peak hours. Narrow roads in interior Kengeri cause congestion.

tuples.title: Positives
tuples.review: Availability of BMTC buses, metro, and train services. Close to Mysore Road, Rajarajeshwari Nagar, and Global Village Tech Park. Affordable rental and property rates compared to central Bangalore. A good option for families, students, and IT professionals seeking peaceful living.

tuples.title: Negatives
tuples.review: Sone interior roads and low-lying areas in kengeri experience waterlogging during heavy rains, making it difficult to commute. There are fewer malls, multiplexes and hangout spots, making it less attractive for those seeking active nightlife.

tuples.title: Positives
tuples.review: I have been staying in Dr Ambedkar Nagar, Ramamurthi Nagar, Bangalore South, for 2 years, and my experience has been very positive. The locality is very peaceful, clean and well-maintained with good connectivity to the main city area. Basic needs like supermarkets, medical stores, schools, and hospitals are all close by, which makes day-to-day life very convenient. Public transport and cab service are easily available, so commuting is not a problem. The neighbourhood is very safe, with friendly residents and a calm environment, which makes it suitable for families as well as working professionals. This city gives me a refreshing feel compared to other busier parts of the city. Overall, it's a great place to stay

tuples.title: Negatives
tuples.review: I have been staying in Dr Ambedkar Nagar, Ramamurthi Nagar, Bangalore South for 2 years. Overall, it has been a good experience, however there are also some drawbacks. During peak hours, trafficking congestion  can be a big issue,especially the main roads leading out of Ramamurthi Nagar. Sometimes, drainage and road maintainance are not up to the mark,which cause inconvenience during the rany season.street lights in a few lanes could also be improved for better safety at night

tuples.title: Positives
tuples.review: Akshaya Nagar 1st Block in Ramamurthy Nagar is a rapidly developing residential locality in East Bangalore and is a good choice for students, professionals, etc. The area is well connected to KR Puram, Whitefield, Banaswadi, and other major hubs via the Outer Ring Road and TC Palaya Main Road. BMTC buses run at regular intervals throughout the day. Shared autos are also easily available, and private cab services like Ola and Uber are accessible. Though the lack of a metro station is disappointing, the upcoming metro extension is expected to improve connectivity further. All basic amenities are within reach; for example, grocery stores, bakeries, salons, ATMs, and pharmacies are within walking distance. Ramamurthy Nagar is also nearby for fresh produce and household goods. Safety is a highlight in Akshaya Nagar. The roads are well lit at night, and PCR vans are stationed nearby, ensuring safety for residents during late hours. Healthcare facilities are conveniently accessible; notable hospitals like Medihope Hospital, Chaya Super Speciality Hospital, and Manipal Hospitals are within a 5 to 7 km radius. The location is ideal for families, as many schools and colleges are available. For leisure and recreation, numerous parks, gyms, and walking paths are easily accessible.

tuples.title: Negatives
tuples.review: During peak hours, Traffic congestion is quite common on the connecting roads like TC Palaya main road and out ring road. Parking can be issue in narrow roads especially in old layouts. Some internal roads are uneven or have potholes, and roadside garbage collection can sometimes be irregular. Water supply is mostly through tankers or borewells, and in summer months, there maybe shortages. Power cut although less frequent still occurs during heavy rains or maintenance works. Due to ongoing construction projects nearby, dust pollution is noticable in certain pockets. Street vendors also occupy footpaths, making it difficult for pedestrians during busy times. Water shortages are frequent.

tuples.title: Positives
tuples.review: Beautiful place and this place have beautiful garden. I like this place. I like places clean and hygienic.it is safe at day and night. Full security. There schools and restaurant nearby. This place is very good place.

tuples.title: Negatives
tuples.review: Very traffic jams. No security at night.  No nearby hospital or restaurant. One restaurant, but very expensive. Drinking water is very bad. Poor public transport.

tuples.title: Positives
tuples.review: Srirampura is an attractive locality in the neighbourhood of rachenahalli jakkur in the north banglore .It is a very busy area economically rich in it hubs , industries etc . The area has a great access to various cities . Several hospitals ,shopping centres, schools ,markets are nearby in walking distance . Lots of parks and gardens are available. Plenty of job opportunities available

tuples.title: Negatives
tuples.review:
This area is very crowded and has enough traffic jam. Poor cabs or auto rickshaw availability 
Air and water pollution is high due to number of industries. Due to the congested place high noise pollution occurs. Poor night patrolling results in high crime.

tuples.title: Positives
tuples.review: Growing city with good economy. Lots of modern infrastructure like schools, restaurants, shops, temples, hospitals can be seen. It is a major part of the town which connects roads to major cities. Availability of transportation are easy with the help of auto,cab, public transportation etc. Fresh air and greenery can be seen in the parks nearby. Availability of clean water is another feature and also have good parking space. Household products are avaliable at ur doorstep with normal rate.

tuples.title: Negatives
tuples.review: The roads are overpopulated. Traffic can be a major issue. The roads are not well maintained. Due to the overpopulation some areas of the city are not hygienic at all. Due to the ongoing construction works in the city it leads to high noise which will cause sound pollution. Regular power cuts are a issue so far. The street lights at some parts of the area are not working properly.

tuples.title: Positives
tuples.review: Telecom layout is a calm and peaceful residancial neighbourhood. The area enjoys good connectivity via the outer ring road. Telecom layout has well rated safety and cleanliness. Residents benifit from easy access to parks and playground nearby. Proximity to the park makes it ideal  for it professionals. The locality is surrounded by green spaces and lakes ,offering a serene atmosphere.

tuples.title: Negatives
tuples.review: Traffic congestion is common on a busy stretch of Thanisandra Main Road. Street light on some stretches is poorly maintained. Rapid development has led to noise from construction sites. Power cuts have been scheduled in sections of Thanisandra Main Road. During peak hours, traffic congestion slows travel significantly. Pollution and overcrowding detract from green spaces like the lake.

pros.text: This locality is very famous for its educational institutions, good hospitals, and well-maintained parks.
In addition, there are plenty of shopping options and entertainment centers nearby, making it an exciting place to live.

Good parks and gardens are available nearby, with good water facilities in all areas. Rachenahalli Lake is here, and average public transport is available. There are badminton and cricket sports academies, and the condition of public toilets is very good.

cons.text: The region also has some drawbacks, including frequent traffic congestion, high property prices, and water shortages.
The nearest shopping mall is quite distant. Waste disposal is an issue that the municipality has not managed correctly at all.

Sometime there are heavy power cuts without notice. Good hospitals are not available here. Garbage cleaning staff does not work properly. Good schools and colleges are far away. Metro station connectivity is not available.

Esteem Enclave in Sarvobhogam Nagar, Bannerghatta Road is a ready-to-move housing society. It offers apartments in varied budget range. These units are a perfect combination of comfort and style, specifically designed to suit your requirements and conveniences. There are 2BHK apartments available in this project. This housing society is now ready to be called home as families have started moving in. Check out some of the features of Esteem Enclave housing society:

*Esteem Enclave Sarvobhogam Nagar has 7 towers, with 9 floors each and 281 units on offer.

*Spread over an area of 4 acres, Esteem Enclave Sarvobhogam Nagar, Bannerghatta Road is one of the spacious housing societies in the Bangalore South region. With all the basic amenities available, Esteem Enclave fits into your budget and your lifestyle.

builder.heading: About Esteem Ventures
builder.name: Esteem Ventures
builder.description: With a rich legacy spanning 40 years, Esteem Ventures has been a pioneering force in Bangalore’s real estate realm. At Esteem, we offer luxury and premium apartments, exquisite villa projects and plotted developments in Bangalore. With a keen eye on quality, excellent location, clear titles and on-time delivery, the company has a loyal and ever-growing customer base in Bengaluru. We have a diverse range of options in Bengaluru, with projects from INR 60 lakhs to INR 6 crores. Our portfolio includes Esteem Northwood, Esteem Aeropark, Esteem Misty Hills, Esteem Emblem, and Esteem South Park.
